## ConnectedComponent type

Applies LibraryManagedAttributes (proper handling of defaultProps and propTypes), as well as defines WrappedComponent.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ConnectedComponent<C extends React.ComponentType<any>, P> = React.NamedExoticComponent<JSX.LibraryManagedAttributes<C, P>> & NonReactStatics<C> & {
    WrappedComponent: C;
};
```
